title: Interactive Tug-of-War Rope Toy
description: The Interactive Tug-of-War Rope Toy in Large size from Bark & Play is designed for larger dogs who enjoy playing tug-of-war. Made from sturdy cotton rope, this toy is built to withstand rough play and provides a great way for you and your dog to bond. The large size and durable construction ensure that this toy will hold up to rigorous tugging and chewing, while the multiple knots offer additional fun for your pet. Ideal for both exercise and play, this toy supports your dog's health and happiness.
meta_title: Interactive Tug-of-War Rope Toy - Large | Bark & Play
meta_description: Buy the Interactive Tug-of-War Rope Toy in Large size from Bark & Play. Perfect for larger dogs, this durable rope toy offers hours of fun and exercise through tug-of-war and fetch.
